Articles.Content:
Well, i may just be leaving the forums. (MAYBE) I have recently gotten up the urge to play orbiter again. maybe ksp can give me some tips ![^_^](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_happy.png) like to get to a planet you dont burn your thrusters right at it and expect to orbit it :-[

could some people explain how to get to the moon, mars ect? and what mods are the best for it?

Cheers!
I said MAYBE. again, im not leaving forever aswell.
